pullrequest.title: Allow putting GUI headers in src/gui and move resources into src/gui

content.raw:
> The requirement to include the moc file sounds like a breaking change.

I'm not sure why this would be a breaking change. The only reason the `moc` files are included is because the header files (``GuiSystem.hh``, ``GuiRunner.hh`, and `TmpIface.hh`) are in currently `/include/...`. In the future, those header files will be moved to `src` at which point, we wouldn't need to include the `moc` files.  This is a limitation of CMake AUTOMOC in that it doesn't autogenerate the `moc` files for included headers that are not in the same directory as the containing `.cc` file. AFAIK, this doesn't affect any of the plugins, and the example you linked should work just fine.
content.html:
The requirement to include the moc file sounds like a breaking change.

I'm not sure why this would be a breaking change. The only reason the moc files are included is because the header files (GuiSystem.hh, `GuiRunner.hh, and TmpIface.hh) are in currently /include/.... In the future, those header files will be moved to src at which point, we wouldn't need to include the moc files. This is a limitation of CMake AUTOMOC in that it doesn't autogenerate the moc files for included headers that are not in the same directory as the containing .cc file. AFAIK, this doesn't affect any of the plugins, and the example you linked should work just fine.
